examples.example: 每天醒来我都会和家人互道一声早安，然后开启美好的一天。

translate.english: Every day when I wake up, I will say good morning to each other with my family and then start a beautiful day.

examples.example: 我微笑着和每一位遇到的人说早安，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: I smile and say good morning to every person I meet, and I feel extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 我喜欢每天对身边的人说早安，感觉特别温暖。

translate.english: I like to say good morning to the people around me every day, and it feels extremely warm.
